body:
A fix for this issue has been included in [Bazel 7.3.0 RC1](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.3.0rc1). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting `USE_BAZEL_VERSION=7.3.0rc1`. Thanks!
